name: Use or Die
description:
Use or Die is a puzzle and platform game developed for Quest 2 and inspired by the "Scape Rooms" and the famous "Saw" movies. 

Your objective is to overcome the various challenges and reach the red doors before the time runs out and the deadly traps are activated.

To achieve this, you will use artifacts on your belt that you can only use once per room.

This game was made for the Jam Hosted by Justin P Barnett - VR Dev, immersive insiders, C-Through and Valem.

Unfortunately I had a lot of work that week and I could only dedicate 3 days to the game, it is a short tutorial that reflects a general idea.

This is my first VR "game", I hope you like it :)
